website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Fresh Foam VAADU received positive feedback regarding its sock-like fit, grippy outsole, and stable platform. The trainer’s lightweight nature yet supportive build also resonated well with testers. Though the trainer was deemed comfortable, there were others who wished the midsole provided more cushion. Other gripes included the inconsistent width measurement and the high collar that caused blisters. But in the end, the lack of a movable tongue which made it tricky to put on became a huge factor for users not to recommend it to their peers.
pros: A fair number of reviewers claimed that the New Balance Fresh Foam VAADU was true to size and fit
The comfort provided by the midsole impressed multiple purchasers
More than a few gym-goers commended the support offered by the footgear
The cleatie style resonated well with a handful of shoppers because it made the trainer easy to put on
Several individuals were satisfied with the sock-like fit, but still had enough room for toe-splay
The grippy outsole worked well during lateral cuts, sprints, and agility workouts, according to some fitness aficionados
A few people appreciated the lightweight nature of the product
A couple of commenters raved that the product was quite stable during weight lifting exercises
cons: A significant number of users described the New Balance Fresh Foam VAADU as the worst trainer they have ever purchased because of the attached tongue that made it difficult to put on
Some wearers complained that the high collar caused blisters on their Achilles
Despite having numerous holes on the façade, the foot chamber was not ventilated, according to a small number of people
A handful of owners wished the sole unit was more cushiony than what was provided
The grippy insole snagged the socks, resulting in the foot sliding inside, a few buyers ranted

customer_reviews.title: Cuts into the ankle.
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the shoe is very good as well as the fit. I went to the YMCA today and used them in there gym, weights and machines. I wore a pair of thin Thorlos Experia socks and that was the problem. The back of the show is elastic with no padding. The back literally cut in to the back of my ankle. Painful. I has to take them off to walk to my car. I will try a pair of original heavy blue and white Thorlos that go above the ankle. My old Converse Chuck Taylors were better for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Strange insole
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are ok, but the inside cushion sole is a strange grippy rubber, it grips your socks and pulls them back as your trying to get them on, and it is a "sock" type shoe, so there is the hole your foot goes in and it is small, so you are trying to get just your foot in and then the sole is grabbing your sock. Pulling them tight against your toes. You have to work your foot for a while to try and get it to fit right. not a deal breaker but annoying, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bonesdug

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Fresh Foam is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, this is the second time I bought this item. NB fresh foam is very comfortable and ideal for running and training. This is a training shoe with a 4mm heel drop and has lots of traction when doing explosive movements like bounds, skips, jumps. This shoe also does very well for running, which adds more bang for your buck. Most training shoes are way too expensive nowadays $80+ and IMO a complete waste of money. Here is a reasonable priced shoe that can be used for training/walking/running, is incredibly comfortable, and has a 4mm heel drop (nearly barefoot feel)!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: These weird plastic slippers are great for dog walking
customer_reviews.text: Neon is very visible and they stay fairly dry in wet grass and drizzle. Hard to put on and the laces are thin and tend to jamb. Inner pad is bumpy. They do not have the cosy feel of regular sneakers and the bottoms are not very well padded. I have not slipped yet. Don't seem to be particularly hot in warm weather. Glad I paid half price.
customer_reviews.author: Tab Numlock

customer_reviews.title: Great lifting, metcon shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I don't replace shoes often and these should last a while. There isn't much ankle support and they feel loose around the sides of my heels. That is the only negative. The foot bed is rubberized. The insole is perforated to breath. The sole has excellent traction. They almost propel you when I run. I use them for CrossFit style workouts and they have a slight heel lift, good for Oly lifting. Definitely wouldn't wear them for rope climbs though. Got my pair for around $30 but they are worth much more.
customer_reviews.author: N. Noblett

customer_reviews.title: too tight to put on
customer_reviews.text: The opening in the shoe is almost too small for my foot without socks. With socks it was nearly impossible. I feel with time the shoe might tear. The tongue is attached to the opening right to the top so there is no leeway to put them on without stretching the material way too much.
customer_reviews.author: Denwa

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite shoes! Wow
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes! Wow, what a great color and fit. Fit is exactly as it should be. My foot is too large and wide for a standard 12, so this shoe was just the right size and width. Other than fit, it's just an extraordinary color. I don't run in them, but they are as comfortable as any cross fit shoe I've ever purchased and the breathable pattern really catches the eye. The shoe gets a lot of attention and compliments and just looks great. I have two pair now and I'm waiting for them to come out in orange!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased. He didn't read good enough. These are a slip on type shoe. He isn't a fan cause he likes to slide on and walk out the door versus these you have to open the top up to get your foot to slide in. Once on, he said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe, but the high back is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVED the look of these shoes, but the were a bit loose and offered little structure for growing feet. Also, the back part of the shoe, the one that hits the back of your ankle is very high and my son said it was uncomfortable. But if that doesn't bother you, the shoe is very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have feet the size or aircraft carriers in both length and width. I didn't want a pair of clunky dad shoes, mid calf socks, since I don't own cargo jorts that go up over my belly button and a t-shirt from when my local sports team made the playoffs 12 years ago. I also will often go the entire summer without wearing socks, so a shoe that breathes is important. These shoes take care of everything, while not looking clunky and goofy. My only issue is that I think these shoes are naturally built to handle pronation. I neither under or over pronate, but I often feel my feet being tilted slightly, bowing my ankles outward.
customer_reviews.author: Allanna Wood

customer_reviews.title: C'Mon New Balance - these are not good
customer_reviews.text: I usually like New Balance shoes. These however were some the most uncomfortable, cheap feeling shoes I have tried on in many years. They ran very wide, were almost plastic-like in look and feel. The bottom felt like it was a third as thick as it is. Couldn't believe how bad these were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support, unique & modern style
customer_reviews.text: My foot is healing from a fracture, I was in need of a shoe with strong support; I'm so glad I found these. The side matteral "hugs" your feet & the shoe feels as if it conformed just to fit you. Great support in the bottom too, there is plenty of cushion to keep you comfortable while making it through your day. Plus, they're really unique looking - men's shoes tend to be fairly generic, this pair stands-out as a unique product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, I had bought the grey pair and liked it so much I bought these. I had a DVT in my right leg recently, along with a severely broken left leg, broken and dislocated ankle, broken foot and torn inside ligament (ICE) several years ago so I wasn't able to walk very well because my shoes were too heavy. These are wonderfully light and I have gotten compliments on how they look. I bought size 13 2E and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: stpatsbaby

customer_reviews.title: My Current Favorite Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes! I wear them everywhere, and they bring a lot of attention, but they also get many compliments. They are also comfortable and I like their neon quality. I have outworn my current ones so it may be time for some new ones...
customer_reviews.author: Malik Lendell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good shoes but im glade i did not pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: A.E

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and good arch support. The 13's are a little snug. Wish there wasn't a huge jump in price from 13 to 13W. But I do like that they are available in neon, even in big sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Servo

customer_reviews.title: About 1/2 smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didnt care for the sticky insole. I replaced them with a slick sided insole which worked much better. Not much in the way of lateral foot support either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe. Would recommend but...
customer_reviews.text: It cut into the ankle. Not the rubbing of the foot but just wearing it the ankle part was very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care for the built in tong. A person with a high instep, has a hard time getting the back stretched over the heel. A defendant problem with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: dale v reeser

customer_reviews.title: Bought for partner, he likes it 😁
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner. He loved it. Was suppose to be a workout shoe but it looks too nice so now its an outting shoe. Fits well and comfy. He is between a slender foot and wide. No complaints :) Can't really go wrong with new balance.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great workout/walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair to wear to the gym. I liked them so much, I bought a second pair to keep at my cabin. I have even played golf in them. Considering buying a third pair for when one of the others need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could have kept them
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice shoe. The bootie style was just not a good fit for me so had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: .wbart

customer_reviews.title: Heal rubbing
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super light weight and the sole is comfy. However, like everyone else that gave these shoes a lesser rating, they tore up the back side of my ankle/heal on my first run. I have retrofitted the ankle/heal area with mole skin and this has fixed the rubbing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Matto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design.
customer_reviews.text: Whose idea was it to put a rubber insole inside a training shoe? Your sock will stop the second it makes contact with that polyethylene insole, all while your toe and foot continues into the shoe. Do not buy unless you intend on putting your own insole into this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shane

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe too bad it was a lot smaller than I had expected for a wide width shoe. I could barely get my foot through the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I thought the shoe fits about a half size big compared to Nike. Got several compliments on them though. The back park is kinda funky so you have to wear a taller sock but thats it. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Hoganomics

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfect and we’re durable. I run everyday and are the most comfortable for the beating my feet take.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Toye

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and are more comfortable and less obtrusive than regular sneakers for playing pickleball.
customer_reviews.author: nh biker

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are really nice to work out in
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are really nice to work out in. Just don't like how the top is closed by the mesh. Wish it would expand a little more. They are pretty darn comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Real

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, just one problem.....
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Only complaint I have is I wish they didn’t make the back so high. It rubbed against the back of my ankle to the point of a near blister. As far as looks however, it was exactly what I wanted. In the meantime, I’ll glue a cushioned fabric of some kind on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Good looking. Comfortable. Squeaky uppers.
customer_reviews.text: Look good. Fit well. Squeaky uppers. You will not successfully sneak up on anyone in these shoes. Dare I say, these take the sneak out of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: whoopi iceberg

customer_reviews.title: Great style. Durable. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Style and fit are awesome! I would say they fit 1/2 size smaller than others.....
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: They looked good, but not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers looked good, but they were not wide enough for me so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: S. GAFFNEY

customer_reviews.title: New Balance shoes are the Best.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance makes the most comfortable shoes. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for drum corps and trail running.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Ive bought multiple pairs in multiple colors and I just love the way they feel on my feet for drum corps and trail running. The one thing I'd recommend is getting different insoles for them.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but they do tend to rub against my achilles
customer_reviews.author: Henry De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: super lite....good looking...fit right
customer_reviews.text: wear these to work, 10 hours a day. Lite on your feet, fit well and look good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, felt like slippers. Soles were too thin however.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: These are one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn ! The fit was just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: The ankle
customer_reviews.text: The lil sick thing around the ankle rubs a bit if you have on ankle socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just wish there was a little bit more room in the toe area. But I love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: EJ ONeil

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and look
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe and fits well. I'm one who likes the bootie type tongue. Insoles are useless and I replaced with arch supporting insoles immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return as it was large and also not clear forefoot support
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Little hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and rugged shoe Wish it had a tab in the back to help pull them on
customer_reviews.author: jaggedlittlepill

customer_reviews.title: Love NB shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I will order more of another color. Fits great and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: christophe g patten

customer_reviews.title: Weirs Sock Style Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 year old son in a size 7 men's. We had a super hard time even getting these on. After the first day of wear he wouldn't wear them again because the shoe is a sock style -- there is no tongue -- and there is a thick tab on the back that comes up real high. He said it was rubbing a raw spot through his sock. I decided to make two vertical, half inch cuts on each side of the tab thing to take the pressure off, which he said fixed the problem and the shoes are comfy otherwise. I'm just worried about the shoe falling apart now since I had to cut it.
customer_reviews.author: birdistheword328Top Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable , this is my third pair of new balance shoes, you can’t go wrong if you order this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: J Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: unable to return for wider side or a different pair...
customer_reviews.author: everette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, I wear 1 13 EE and these fit great, not even close to being tight.
customer_reviews.author: stpatsbaby

product_meta.title: New Balance - Mens Fresh Foam MXVAD Shoes, 11.5 UK - Width 2E, Black/White Munsell
product_meta.description: Explode off the line with the Mxvadov1. With our fresh foam midsole and quix insert to support dynamic movements during your toughest training sessions.
